# Ethnicity_Inference_450k
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/157613129.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/157613129)

This repository contains all code used to develop the PlaNET, a DNAme-based ethnicity classifier for
placental DNA methylation microarray data [1].

See my other repository, [wvictor14/planet](https://github.com/wvictor14/planet), to download the placental 
DNAm-based ethnicity classifier.

## References

[1] Yuan V, Price M, Del Gobbo G, Cox B, Binder AM, Michels KB, Marsit C, Robinson W: Inferring
population structure from placental DNA methylation studies. *In prep.*
